Interface Graph<V,E>

All Known Implementing Classes:
WeightedGraph
public interface Graph<V,E>
Graph Interface

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add1Edge(V source, V destination, double weight)
    Adds a directed edge from the source to the destination vertex with the specified weight.
    void
    addEdge(V source, V destination, double weight)
    Adds an undirected edge to the graph between the source and destination vertices with the specified weight.
    void
    addVertex(V vertex)
    Adds a vertex to the graph.
    ArrayList<E>
    checkHamilton(ArrayList<String> visited)
    Checks for a completed Hamiltonian Cycle based on the visited vertices.

    createGraphWithHamiltonianCircuit()
    Creates a graph with a Hamiltonian circuit.

    getAllWeightsSum()
    Returns the sum of weights for all edges in the graph.

    Returns the edge between the source and destination vertices, or null if no edge exists.

    Returns a list of neighboring vertices for the given vertex.

    • hasEdge

      boolean hasEdge(V source, V destination)
      Checks if there is an edge between the source and destination vertices.
      Parameters:
      source - the source vertex
      destination - the destination vertex
      Returns:
      true if there is an edge between the vertices, false otherwise

      destination - the destination vertex

      Returns:

    • checkHamilton

      ArrayList<E> checkHamilton(ArrayList<String> visited)
      Checks for a completed Hamiltonian Cycle based on the visited vertices.
      Parameters:
      visited - the list of visited vertices
      Returns:
      a list of edges representing a Hamiltonian Cycle if found, otherwise an empty list

      Graph<V,E> createGraphWithHamiltonianCircuit()
      Creates a graph with a Hamiltonian circuit.
